title: Pumpkin Icon
body:
There was a pumpkin icon for halloween. I sent a gift to get it but I don't have the Icon yet. 

I saw that I might have to wait up to two weeks for it to appear on my account but was just wondering :U

replies.body: The page meant two weeks *after* November 3rd, which means you should get it by November 17th at the latest. If you haven't received it by then, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

I haven't gotten mine either. I sent the gift on day 1. 

I also haven't gotten my Lil Devil Teemo icon.
